description:
Hiroko Yamashita as child, back in the days of the http://anidb.net/ch25796 [YLEM project].
Hiroko`s special ability was teleporting objects, as mentioned by http://anidb.net/ch13446 [Saiko Yuki] during episode 10. http://anidb.net/ch25716 [Annie] acquired this ability by killing http://anidb.net/ch25791 [Hiroko] during the events of episode 10; Yuki acquired this ability by defeating Annie at the end of episode 10. Yuki being able to teleport all http://anidb.net/ch25714 [AMP] members out of the destruction area of their office during the battle in episode 25 allowed the whole AMP team to survive the "F mission" strike.
name: Hiroko-chan
